newsitem.title: BELGIUM: SOCCER-GERETS TO COACH CLUB BRUGGE.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-GERETS TO COACH CLUB BRUGGE.

text.p: Former Belgium defender Eric Gerets will coach Belgian champions Club Brugge from next season, his current club Lierse said on Monday.
"I got a call from Eric saying he has a contract with Club Brugge for the next two seasons," Lierse chairman Freddy Van Laer told BRTN television.
Lierse coach Gerets, a former AC Milan and PSV Eindhoven player, will succeed Hugo Broos who is quitting Brugge after six years. He is expected to move to Lierse.
Club Brugge and Lierse are second and third respectively in the Belgian first division. Mouscron are the surprise leaders.
